name: Prism
overview: Prism is an ISM Storydisk which tells the wonderous tale of the theft of the three ancient Keys of Color,m and the adventures of the young boy who must seek them in the monstrous kingdom of Yolsva, Plane of Darkness. All is chaos, and the story contains many levels of hiddne meaning through which the Keys may be found and reunited with the prism. When this occurs, and only then, can the mysterious and magical ending of PRISM unfold.
